translation.en: I went to five stations before I found one still selling diesel.
translation.es: Tuve que ir a cinco estaciones para encontrar una con diésel.

translation.en: Why did that stupid motherfucker go to all that trouble to find diesel?
translation.es: ¿Para qué se tomó la molestia de buscar diésel ese hijo de puta?

translation.en: Wouldn't regular have done the job?
My boys find you, they're gonna fuck you up!
translation.es: ¡Cuando mi gente te encuentre, te hará mierda!

translation.en: You gotta try harder to be my friend.
And after what you did here today,
translation.es: Y, después de lo que hiciste hoy,

translation.en: the Dumois family is never gonna stop hunting you.
translation.es: la familia Dumois nunca dejará de buscarte.

translation.en: You don't have to do this, man.
We don't know how much gasoline is on your lips...
translation.es: No sabemos si la gasolina que tienes en la boca alcanzará

translation.en: But there's enough in this tub.
translation.es: Pero hay mucha en la bañera.

translation.en: So if you stay real still,
translation.es: Así que, si te quedas quieto,

translation.en: maybe this will burn itself out on your face.
translation.es: quizá esto se te apague en la cara.

translation.en: The President himself has confirmed that the US has indeed been involved
translation.es: El propio presidente confirmó que Estados Unidos

translation.en: in the final stages of deploying the American Peace Initiative
translation.es: pronto implementará la Iniciativa Estadounidense de Paz

translation.en: The API is described as a signal
translation.es: Aparentemente, la IEP es una señal

translation.en: that acts as a synaptic blocker,
making it impossible for anyone to perform an act
translation.es: e impide que cualquiera lleve a cabo acciones

translation.en: Once live, the API signal promises to influence criminal activity
translation.es: Cuando esté activa, la IEP promete influir en la actividad criminal

translation.en: No one will be allowed to pass without proper identification.
America, one week left to make your own choices.
translation.es: EE. UU. Solo te queda una semana para decidir por ti mismo.

translation.en: One week before the government climbs into your head and takes the wheel.
translation.es: Luego, el gobierno se meterá en tu cabeza y tomará el control.

translation.en: In the face of it, most people just lay down and give up.
translation.es: Ante el cambio, la mayoría baja los brazos.

translation.en: Others will still try anything to get out of this shit town.
translation.es: Otros harán lo que sea para salir de esta ciudad de mierda.

translation.en: Freedom, so close, just across the bridge. Canada.
translation.es: La libertad está cerca, al otro lado del puente. Canadá.

translation.en: But most people will die before they ever see the red- and- white flag.
translation.es: Pero la mayoría morirá antes de ver la bandera blanca y roja.

translation.en: One year ago, Bricke and his crew were golden.
translation.es: Hace un año, Bricke y su pandilla estaban en la cima.

translation.en: They hit banks hard and fast,
and they were damn good at it.
Bricke was their fearless leader. But they didn't run this city.
translation.es: Bricke era su líder intrépido. Pero no eran los dueños de la ciudad.

translation.en: That honor belonged to the Dumois crime family.
translation.es: Ese honor era de la familia Dumois.

translation.en: So long as the Dumois got their cut, they left him alone.
translation.es: Mientras los Dumois recibieran su parte, lo dejaban en paz.

translation.en: Bricke's only weakness was his brother, Rory.
translation.es: La única debilidad de Bricke era su hermano, Rory.

translation.en: He was the heart of the group,
and he was about to do his first stretch in prison.
translation.es: y estaba a punto de conocer la cárcel.

translation.en: Keep to yourself. You're out in six months.
translation.es: Sé reservado. Saldrás en seis meses.

translation.en: Would you relax? We're supposed to be celebrating.
In six months, I'll probably be running that joint.
translation.es: Seguro terminaré siendo el rey de la cárcel.

translation.en: It shows you who you already are.
Yeah, well, maybe I'm tougher than you think,
translation.es: Quizá sea más rudo de lo que crees.

translation.en: one of the worst terrorist attacks on US soil.
translation.es: uno de los peores ataques terroristas en suelo estadounidense.

translation.en: The government had been working on the API signal in secret labs for years.
translation.es: Hacía años que el gobierno preparaba la señal IEP en secreto.

translation.en: Now they decided it was time to start testing on the real world.
translation.es: Y decidió que era hora de probarla en el mundo real.

translation.en: It wasn't till six months ago that they got their first taste.
translation.es: La probaron por primera vez recién hace seis meses.

translation.en: We have to get out of here. Come on. Take the money!
translation.es: Salgamos de aquí. Vamos. Toma el dinero.

translation.en: tuning their little box of horrors,

translation.es: Jugaba a ser Jesús con cerebros ajenos.

translation.en: and we were all their guinea pigs.
translation.es: Y nosotros éramos sus conejillos de Indias.

translation.en: The test was short, but it hit them hard enough to understand that something was coming.
translation.es: La prueba fue corta, pero les alcanzó para entender que se acercaba algo.

translation.en: Yeah, I'm talking to you, Bricke.
translation.es: Sí, te hablo a ti, Bricke.

translation.en: Bricke hid the money and lied, said he lost it.
translation.es: Bricke escondió el dinero y mintió, dijo que lo había perdido.

translation.en: Just enough to escape to Canada
before the Dumois got around to killing them all.
translation.es: antes de que los Dumois los mataran a todos.

translation.en: All right, everybody out. Come on.
Get the fuck out! Come on.
Move! All right. Come on, lady.
It was a good plan until Rory killed himself in prison,
translation.es: Era un buen plan hasta que Rory se suicidó en la cárcel

translation.en: and Johnny Dee sold them out.

translation.es: - Un callejón sin salida. - Nadie pasa sin identificación.

translation.en: No one will be allowed to pass without proper identification.
translation.es: - Un callejón sin salida. - Nadie pasa sin identificación. ACTIVACIÓN DE IEP

translation.en: We've been here for an hour. Come on.  I told you I can't fucking see him.
translation.es: - Llevamos una hora aquí. - Que no lo veo, carajo.

translation.en: - Fuck you, keep a lookout. - Yeah, fuck me.
- No, not fuck me. Actually, it's fuck you. - Shut up.
translation.es: - No, yo no. El cabrón eres tú. - Cállate.

translation.en: I mean, everything's just so upside down, right?
A couple of Dumois have been sniffing around recently.
- You might not want to let them find you. - I know.
translation.es: - No te conviene que te encuentren. - Ya sé.

translation.en: I have things that'll hurt permanently to death,
translation.es: Tengo cosas que dolerán permanentemente y hasta la muerte, si eso quieres.
permanentemente y hasta la muerte, si eso quieres.

translation.en: and I'm not talking about bunny- hugging Perestroika bullshit.
translation.es: y no hablo de las bobadas inocentonas de la Perestroika,

translation.en: I'm talking about basement- level, Soviet, melt- your- fucking- brain shit.
translation.es: sino de la mierda soviética más cruel y clandestina.

translation.en: I don't know anyone who has survived the neurotoxin collateral damage.
translation.es: No conozco a nadie que haya sobrevivido al daño colateral de la neurotoxina.

translation.en: Please tell me that this is not for your own use.
translation.es: Por favor, dime que no es para que la uses tú.

translation.en: Prior to this, fights have been erupting all day
translation.es: Antes, hubo peleas todo el día

translation.en: between pro- API nationalists and protesters.
translation.es: entre defensores de la IEP y manifestantes.

translation.en: A local state of emergency has been declared...
There are some women in the world who change the way the air is in a room.
translation.es: Hay mujeres que cambian el aire cuando entran a un lugar.

translation.en: There are some women in the world worth killing for...
translation.es: Hay mujeres por las que vale la pena matar.

translation.en: and just a few worth dying for.
translation.es: Y unas pocas por las que vale la pena morir.

translation.en: Police were forced to use tear gas
translation.es: La policía tuvo que usar gases lacrimógenos contra la multitud,

translation.en: to try and disperse earlier crowds in which many arrests have been made.
translation.es: La policía tuvo que usar gases lacrimógenos contra la multitud, se hicieron muchísimos arrestos.

translation.en: ♪ For I've been a temptress too long ♪
That's some bruise you've got there.
The shit that I get up to.
you must have done something pretty awful to deserve that, Captain.
translation.es: Debe haber hecho algo terrible para merecer eso, capitán.

translation.en: I've got a to- do list.
translation.es: Tengo una lista de cosas por hacer.

translation.en: Yeah, but you fucked around behind her back, didn't you?
translation.es: Sí, pero te cogiste a otras, ¿o no?

translation.en: We all hurt the ones who try and love us.
translation.es: Todos lastimamos a los que nos aman.

translation.en: How's that heart working out for you?
Let's go check a to- do off my list.
translation.es: Tachemos una tarea de mi lista.

translation.en: What did we just check off your list?
So, you never saw this guy before?
Graham Bricke? He's about my height? He's a little bit shorter, I think.
translation.es: ¿Graham Bricke? De mi altura. Un poco más bajo, quizá.

translation.en: - - You know, my wife would really--
Don't worry, I think I found him.
Five seconds won't be enough. Five seconds?
Five words. I'm going to give you five words that are gonna...
translation.es: Cinco palabras. Te diré cinco palabras

translation.en: That are-- They're gonna make your whole world go upside down.
translation.es: que dejarán tu mundo patas para arriba.

translation.en: It's gonna make you take that gun out of my face.
translation.es: Harán que me quites esa pistola de la cara.

translation.en: You look ready. All right, here we go.
It's not really a word, it's more like a name, but it means something to you.
translation.es: No es una palabra, es un nombre, pero significa algo para ti.

translation.en: Something they wrote down on a little piece of paper,
translation.es: Lo que escribieron en un papelito

translation.en: to tell you how your poor little brother died,
translation.es: para decirte cómo murió tu hermanito,

translation.en: which leads me to word three, which is bullshit!
translation.es: y me lleva a la tercera palabra: ¡Mentira!.

translation.en: And since word three is doing such a bang- up job,
translation.es: Y, como la tercera palabra va muy bien,

translation.en: I'm gonna move on to word four, which is,
translation.es: voy a pasar a la cuarta, que es:

translation.en: I was there. I saw him fucking die.
translation.es: Estuve ahí, lo vi morir, carajo.

translation.en: They used the signal to kill your brother.
I wanna use it to steal their money.
translation.es: Quiero usarla para robarles su dinero.

translation.en: you can leave a big fuck you for Rory sign behind.
translation.es: será como dejarles un cartel que diga: Jódanse, por Rory.

translation.en: You a guy who can help me steal 30 million dollars?
Because your brother thought you were.
translation.es: Porque tu hermano pensaba que sí.

translation.en: Listen, when you get to know me a bit better,
translation.es: Mira, cuando me conozcas mejor entenderás que solo me importa...

translation.en: you're going to realize I'm all about...
translation.es: cuando me conozcas mejor entenderás que solo me importa...

translation.en: did I introduce you to my, uh, my fiancée,
Pleasure to meet you, Mr. Bricke.
Pleasure to meet you, Mr. Bricke. Pleasure to meet you, Mr. Bricke.
Sometimes, you get to see the bullet that has your name on it.
translation.es: A veces, ves la bala que es para ti.

translation.en: That first step is a doozy.
What can I get you? You want something? A drink?
Some cocaine? We got some great cocaine.  What happened to my brother?
translation.es: - ¿Cocaína? Tenemos de primera. - ¿Qué le pasó a mi hermano?

translation.en: Just... let me show you something.

translation.es: Es la Casa de la Moneda.

translation.en: That's where they make money. That?
translation.es: Ahí fabrican el dinero. Esa es la gran nación de Canadá.

translation.en: That's the great nation of Canada.
translation.es: Esa es la gran nación de Canadá.

translation.en: that's the only API tower covering both this and that.
translation.es: ...es la única Torre de la IEP que cubre esto y eso.

translation.en: Look, you're like a dog with a bone. You see it already?
translation.es: Eres como un perro con un hueso. ¿Ya lo viste?

translation.en: You see what I'm talking about.
What are you gonna do with the cash? You can't spend it.
translation.es: ¿Qué harás con el dinero? No puedes gastarlo.

translation.en: You know, there are so many other places in this world you can spend your money.
translation.es: Hay muchos otros lugares del mundo para gastar el dinero.

translation.en: Yeah, but most of the city belongs to the police.
translation.es: Sí, pero la policía cubre casi toda la ciudad.

translation.en: The thing is, on the night of the API, when they do that whole thing,
translation.es: Pero, la noche de la IEP, cuando la implementen,

translation.en: the cops, they turn in all their weapons,
and then all the policing is done by one fat, middle- aged...
translation.es: y toda la vigilancia quedará a cargo de un viejo gordo...

translation.en: Wait. Baby, what the hell is that guy's name?
He's the systems manager at our tower.
translation.es: El gerente de sistemas de nuestra torre.

translation.en: It's insane the things guys will do for a pretty girl.
translation.es: Ni se imaginan qué hacen los tipos por una chica linda.

translation.en: I mean, Carl's gonna have a--
And we stick this in the right place at the right time,
translation.es: Pondremos esto en el lugar y el momento correctos

translation.en: and we got ourselves... 30 minutes more than the rest of America.
translation.es: y tenemos 30 minutos más que el resto de Estados Unidos.

translation.en: Thirty minutes, maybe 35, which is tight, but just enough time
translation.es: Treinta minutos, tal vez cinco más. No mucho, pero alcanzará

translation.en: to get from here to there, and then we're trillionaires.
translation.es: para llegar de ahí hasta ahí. Y seremos billonarios.

translation.en: You don't want a drink? I got great scotch.
translation.es: ¿No quieres un trago? Tengo un gran whisky.

translation.en: I knew your brother well. I did time with your brother.
translation.es: Lo conocía bien. Estuve preso con él.

translation.en: Yeah, we both volunteered for the great opportunity to get our fucking brains... zapped.
translation.es: Nos ofrecimos ante la gran oportunidad de que nos frieran el cerebro.

translation.en: Give us a little bit more time in the yard,
translation.es: Nos daban más tiempo de patio,

translation.en: some commissary, you know, free ice cream.
Your brother wouldn't-- didn't commit suicide.
He was fucking murdered by a guard.
Beaten to death by a fucking guard.
translation.es: Lo mató a golpes un puto guardia.

translation.en: I watched it. I couldn't do anything about it.
translation.es: Lo vi. No pude hacer nada.

translation.en: We should do this for Rory.
You should do it for him.
If you look at your packages,
translation.es: Verán en sus indemnizaciones que el presidente autorizó

translation.en: you'll see that the President has authorized a 2% increase off your bases,
translation.es: Verán en sus indemnizaciones que el presidente autorizó un aumento del 2 % en el básico,

translation.en: which means we're getting close to 75% salary.
translation.es: por lo que nos acercamos a un 75 % del salario.

translation.en: Now, in the meantime, everyone is on full duty
until midnight this time next week when the API signal goes live.
translation.es: hasta la medianoche en una semana, cuando se active la señal.

translation.en: At which time, all policing duty will be transferred
translation.es: En ese momento, las funciones de la policía pasarán

translation.en: to a new branch of enforcement run out of DC.
translation.es: a una nueva autoridad de justicia que operará desde D. C.

translation.en: All those who've signed up for the implant,
translation.es: Para los que pidieron el implante,

translation.en: you will be notified 24 hours prior of your status.
translation.es: les informarán su estado con 24 horas de anticipación.

translation.en: Okay, page three. This is where we're gonna find medical.
translation.es: Bien, página tres. Aquí está el seguro médico.

translation.en: And those of you who will be staying on will have the same co- pay as always.
translation.es: Los que se queden mantendrán el mismo copago de siempre.

translation.en: Um... just have a seat one second.
These changes will all go into effect as of next week,
translation.es: Todo entrará en vigencia la semana que viene,

translation.en: so if this is gonna cause you problems, don't talk to me.
translation.es: así que si tienen algún problema, no me lo traigan a mí,

translation.en: Bring it to the Health Services Department.
translation.es: hablen con el Departamento de Salud.

translation.en: Uh, there's a lady out front, looks pretty banged up.
translation.es: Hay una señora adelante, parece bastante herida.

translation.en: Okay, page three. This is where you'll find the medical.
translation.es: Página tres. Ahí está la información médica.

translation.en: You can't be behind there, okay?
I'm gonna have to ask you to step out from behind--
- What happened to your face? - Fuck you.
translation.es: - ¿Qué le pasó? - Vete a la mierda.

translation.en: Oh, you wanna fucking die, man?
You wanna fucking die? Where's the shit? Where's the shit?
Yeah, that's right. Right in your fucking house, pig.
translation.es: Así es. En tu puta casa, cerdo.

translation.en: While I wait for my friend to find all that contraband...
translation.es: Mientras mi amiga busca el contrabando...

translation.en: We're always glad to have the governor in the room today,
translation.es: Siempre es un placer contar con el gobernador,

translation.en: speaking on behalf of the API signal.
translation.es: que hablará de la señal IEP.

translation.en: Well, look, we realize that any amnesty program isn't perfect.
translation.es: Sabemos que ningún programa de amnistía es perfecto.

translation.en: any ill- gotten gains would become useless to those who have them.
translation.es: las ganancias obtenidas de ilícitos no servirán de nada.

translation.en: So, you're going to pay people for money they stole.
translation.es: ¿Le pagarán a la gente por el dinero que robó?

translation.en: If that's the way you wanna put it.
translation.es: Si quiere decirlo de ese modo...

translation.en: If the recommendations are not carried out...
translation.es: Si no se siguen las recomendaciones...

translation.en: I met a friend of yours.
What are you getting me into?
We have a specialist with us today talking about the inherent problems with the API signal.
translation.es: Un especialista nos explicará los problemas inherentes de la señal.
La señal es prácticamente un 100 % efectiva.

translation.en: And while it's true we've seen an interruption of control
translation.es: Y, si bien hubo interrupción del control

translation.en: in subjects undergoing traumatic brain injury,
the level of trauma necessary to interfere with the signal
translation.es: el nivel de trauma necesario para interferir con la señal

translation.en: Yes, you can damage the brain enough to break the connection,
translation.es: Se puede dañar el cerebro para interrumpir la conexión, sí,

translation.en: but this is hardly a practical means to defeat the system.
translation.es: pero no es un medio práctico para vencer al sistema.

translation.en: So in theory, an individual could break from API control...
translation.es: Así que, en teoría, un individuo podría liberarse...

translation.en: Are we gonna do therapy instead?
In case it comes down to your boy or me,
translation.es: Si se trata de tu novio o yo,

translation.en: But this score of his... has a real chance of working.
translation.es: Pero este atraco que ideó tiene posibilidades.

translation.en: What makes you so sure that the score was Kevin's idea?
translation.es: ¿Por qué estás tan seguro de que el atraco fue idea de Kevin?

translation.en: - Hey, baby. - This place is a total shithole.
translation.es: - Hola, amor. - Este lugar es una mierda.

translation.en: So what are we doing? We all moving in together?
We're talking about a billion dollars sitting in a vault right now.
translation.es: Hay mil millones en esa bóveda ahora mismo.

translation.en: - A billion dollars? - Wait, even in hundreds,
that's like three tons. It's 20 cubic yards.
translation.es: son como tres toneladas. 20 metros cúbicos.

translation.en: That's-- I don't even know how to move that.
translation.es: No sé cómo trasladar algo así.

translation.en: The factory doesn't just handle new money.
translation.es: Es que no solo manejan dinero nuevo,

translation.en: And with all that new cash piling up, they're working double time
translation.es: Con el nuevo efectivo acumulado, trabajan doble turno

translation.en: they shred millions, load up a big dump truck,
and send her across town where they light it up.
translation.es: y lo despachan para quemar todo.

translation.en: You got the good money and the bad money
in one place at the same time?
Take the money, drive to Canada, die rich.
translation.es: Tomar el dinero, ir a Canadá, morir ricos.

translation.en: Yeah, yeah, but what's the plan?
We take the money, drive to Canada, and die rich.
translation.es: Tomamos el dinero, vamos a Canadá y morimos ricos.

translation.en: - It's my fucking job. - No, it's not.
translation.es: - Es mi puto atraco. - Claro que no.

translation.es: Primero, un chofer. Tengo un contacto.

translation.en: Great, you got a guy now.
- And it doesn't have to be real. - Yeah.
translation.es: - No tienen que ser reales. - Eso.

translation.en: I'll need three EFP cone warheads, like the ones they use against tanks.
translation.es: ...necesito tres ojivas EFP cónicas como las que se usan con tanques.

translation.en: Thing is that I can only think of two places
translation.es: Es que solo se me ocurren dos lugares

translation.en: where we can find them, the US Army and...
I just said no problem. What are you thinking?
translation.es: Dije que no hay problema. ¿No me oyes?
Eres el hijo de Rossi Dumois.

translation.en: Your father runs the biggest crime syndicate in the city.
translation.es: Tu padre dirige la mafia más grande de la ciudad.

translation.en: He alone stands to inherit billions,
translation.es: Él va a heredar miles de millones,

translation.en: and you both live holed up in a skanky loft, surrounded by landmines.
translation.es: pero viven en un loft apestoso, rodeados de minas.

translation.en: Look, it doesn't fucking matter who the fuck my father is, all right?
translation.es: No importa quién mierda es mi padre.

translation.en: What the fuck are you doing?
Your father has a hit out on me, so you better fucking explain yourself.
translation.es: Tu padre me quiere matar, así que mejor explícate.

translation.en: Listen, Bricke, this jacket's Armani, man, please.
translation.es: Bricke, esta chaqueta es de Armani, por favor.

translation.en: That's what it's gonna say on my tombstone.
translation.es: Eso es lo que dirá mi lápida.

translation.en: The moment the fucking signal hits,
making it the last fucking crime in American history,
translation.es: ¡será el último crimen de EE. UU.!

translation.en: that's legacy, my friend. Legacy, that's another good word.
translation.es: Eso es dejar un legado. Legado. Otra buena palabra.

translation.en: So, you want revenge. I want legacy.
By the way, my loft is not skanky, okay?
translation.es: Por cierto, mi loft no es apestoso, ¿sí?

translation.en: It's a fuck of a thing that happened to you, what with two days left to go.
translation.es: Qué mierda lo que te pasó, cuando quedan solo dos días.

translation.es: Deme un patrullero, sargento. No me importa cuál.

translation.en: Now, why the fuck would you wanna do that?
wanna do it right, you know?
It's been my whole life, Sarge.

translation.en: - Thank you. - Knock yourself out, supercop.
- Be safe out there. - Can I have a vest? Thank you.
- You wanna drive today? - Yeah, I'm good.
Every trust- fund asshole and Daddy's little coke fiend
translation.es: Todos los financistas de mierda y los niños ricos cocainómanos

translation.en: are getting ready for the ultimate rave.
translation.es: se preparan para la última rave.

As soon as the API is on,
they won't have to worry about anyone taking it from them.

translation.en: Fucking assholes. Hey! Where's my table?
What was I saying? I was talking about something.
You were talking about your manifesto.
Oh, yeah, the manifesto that nobody cares about,
translation.es: Cierto, el manifiesto que no le importa a nadie,

translation.en: Do you know that this one has gone
to the most prestigious technological school
translation.es: en la universidad tecnológica más prestigiosa

translation.en: She has a diploma with her name on it.
translation.es: Tiene un diploma con su nombre.

translation.en: And before that, she hacked the... FBI?
Look at you. She's, like, embarrassed.
Yeah, it went FBI, MIT, and then you.
translation.es: Sí, primero el FBI, luego el MIT y ahora tú.

translation.en: every great man is a woman.
translation.es: ...de un gran hombre hay una mujer.

translation.es: ¿Quién dice que eres un gran hombre, amor?

translation.en: Who says that you're a great man, darling?
translation.es: ¿Quién dice que eres un gran hombre, amor?.

translation.en: You're so funny. These fucking jokes, they're so funny.
translation.es: Qué graciosa. Sus chistes son muy graciosos.

translation.en: Why don't you go get us some fucking champagne, huh?
molecular modulation of the prefrontal cortex.

translation.es: Se oyeron disparos. Al registrar la propiedad,

translation.en: The process of identifying the victims is still underway.
translation.es: Aún están tratando de identificar a las víctimas.

translation.en: This, in many ways, was an all too familiar sight
translation.es: En muchos sentidos, no es novedad,

translation.en: as both sides of the debate over the API have resorted to violence.
translation.es: pues ambos bandos han recurrido a la violencia.

translation.en: I'm just hanging out with Carl.

A state of emergency has been declared.
translation.es: Se ha declarado estado de emergencia.

translation.es: La policía lanzó gases lacrimógenos e hizo numerosos arrestos.

translation.en: Tell them we're just about to lose

translation.es: Está en la sala de servidores, a la izquierda.

translation.en: What're you gonna do with her?
I need you to tell me what the fuck is going on right now.
translation.es: Dime qué mierda está pasando. Ya mismo.

translation.en: Oh, shit. Did I just do that?
- What did you do? - Look at you.
- You're like a lion with no balls. - What are you doing?
translation.es: - Eres como un león sin pelotas. - ¿Qué haces?

translation.en: Everyone's at the zoo, staring at him.
translation.es: Todos lo miran en el zoológico.

translation.en: Look, it's a lion with no fucking balls.
Don't do it. Don't do what?
Please don't do what? What shouldn't I do?
- Please don't do this. Stop! - What?
- Not kill your best friend? - Stop!
- No! - What are you doing? Huh?
You're never there for the people you love.
translation.es: Nunca estás cuando tus seres queridos te necesitan.

translation.en: I got a secret to tell you.
translation.es: Te voy a contar un secreto.

translation.en: You need to pay attention to this.
Every Friday, we'd meet in the yard.
translation.es: Los viernes nos veíamos en el patio.

translation.en: and get us to do the nastiest shit to each other.
translation.es: Y nos obligaban a hacernos lo peor.

translation.en: And then, they would turn on the brain rape.
translation.es: Y ahí activaban la violación cerebral.

translation.en: - Get in there! - You ever read William Burroughs?
He had a thing called the cop within, you know, morality, right, wrong.
translation.es: Hablaba de el policía interno. La moralidad. El bien, el mal.

translation.en: Turns out, even a sociopathic fucker like me has one.
translation.es: Resulta que hasta un sociópata como yo lo tiene.

translation.en: And I had something else nobody else had:
translation.es: Y tenía algo más que nadie más tenía.
...que la nada absoluta significaba cualquier cosa.

translation.en: And Jesus Christ as my witness,
translation.es: Y, te lo juro por Dios,

translation.en: You know actually killing your brother got me out of jail?
translation.es: ¿Sabías que matar a tu hermano me sacó de la cárcel?

translation.en: My lawyers had a field day with that one.
translation.es: Mis abogados lo explotaron a fondo.

translation.en: They didn't realize what a gift it was.
translation.es: No se dieron cuenta del don.

translation.en: Um, I'm not sure if you're listening to me.
translation.es: No sé si me estás escuchando.

translation.en: Not for you and certainly not for that bitch.
translation.es: Ni por ti, ni menos por esa zorra.

translation.en: What are you doing? Trying to shoot me again?
Pussy. That's your problem. That's your problem.
translation.es: Eres cagón. Ese es tu problema.

translation.en: You know, I actually like you, Bricke.
translation.es: En realidad, me caes bien, Bricke.

translation.en: You know what the really fucked- up thing is?
You're a tough son of a bitch, you know that?
Three points for the next one.
Okay. Take the final one. I'm getting bored.
translation.es: Bueno, el último, que me aburro.

translation.en: But I'm not done playing yet.
You fucking piece of shit motherfucker!

translation.es: Eso no se ve muy bien.

translation.en: Hey. Thanks for helping with this, Bricke. You did a great job.
translation.es: Gracias por la ayuda, Bricke. Estuviste genial.
Por fin agarramos a esta mierda.

translation.es: Solo nos falta encontrar a la chica del trío

translation.en: and we can end this chapter permanently.
Yeah, I remember, but you know what?

translation.es: Todo se mueve como los planetas.

but I think he won't make it.
